hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.subtitle: Computer Engineer | Full Stack Developer | DevOps Enthusiast
hero.description: As an engineer with a passion for modern technology, I create end-to-end solutions by combining frontend and backend development processes. I implement software projects by creating user-friendly interfaces and powerful infrastructures.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.intro: Showcasing my expertise in programming, tools, and frameworks.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I Am and What I Do

education.title: Education
education.description: The education I received from Computer Engineering Department  at Kırıkkale University provided me with the opportunity to enhance my abilities in algorithm development and problem-solving. I had the chance to engage in the creation of numerous projects centered on object-oriented programming (OOP) and data structures.

personalStatement.title: My Interests
personalStatement.contentI: As a computer engineer, I have a profound interest in web development, database management, front-end technologies, and container technologies. I develop web applications with technologies such as Flask, Django, and ASP.NET MVC Framework. I create modern and user-friendly interfaces using Angular, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. I provide database management and query optimization using T-SQL and PostgreSQL. I also increase the portability and efficiency of projects with Docker and Kubernetes.
personalStatement.contentII: As a software developer who is open to continuous learning, loves research, and has strong analytical thinking skills, I am always ready for new technologies and challenging projects.

entriesI.description: Managed IT infrastructure, provided technical support, and implemented security protocols to ensure smooth operations within the organization.

entriesII.description: My contributions to website development include the use of the Flask framework and PostgreSQL, as well as the integration of payment systems with the iyzico API. Additionally, I ensure the high performance and scalability of web applications.

entriesIII.description: Contributed to website development, including payment system integrations using the iyzico API and ensuring high performance and scalability of web applications.

technicalSkills.title: Technical Skills
technicalSkills.description: My technical expertise includes backend development using ASP.NET Core and Django REST Framework, frontend development with Angular and Bootstrap, and database management with PostgreSQL and MySQL. I am also experienced in DevOps practices, particularly containerization with Docker and Kubernetes.

personalAttributes.title: Personal Attributes
personalAttributes.description: I am an analytical thinker with strong time management and team leadership skills. I am eager to contribute to innovative projects and take on new challenges that align with my skills and interests.
